description: Database design for MEA_VOC input web application
author: Sirijet Simsawas

properties.description: ID of category that is object ID assigned by MongoDB
properties.name: _id

properties.description: Path of ascestor comma , as delimiter e.g. ,A,B,. null means root
properties.name: path

properties.description: Channel ID, object ID assigned by MongoDB
properties.name: _id

properties.description: Name of channel that issue comes in
properties.name: name

properties.description: Issue ID assigned by MEA_VOC system
properties.name: issueId

properties.description: Ticket number received from Call Center
properties.name: ticketNo

properties.description: Received from CC === docType that returned from CC
properties.name: issueType

properties.description: Title of issue filled by user
properties.name: title

properties.description: Description of issue filled by user
properties.name: description

properties.description: Channel ID ref from Channels collection
properties.name: channel

properties.description: Organization ID ref from Organizations collection
properties.name: assignee

properties.description: Category ID ref from Categories collection
properties.name: category

properties.description: Date that issue is filled into the system
properties.name: openDate

collections.description: Collection for storing MEA_VOC user data
